AT.name: Mr. Driller™2
AT.description: Die Welt steht erneut kurz davor, unter einer Horde rätselhafter Blöcke begraben zu werden. Nur der heldenhafte Mr. Driller kann sie jetzt noch retten! Oder etwa nicht? Gestatten: Anna Hottenmayer, eine rivalisierende Bohrerin! Übernimm die Kontrolle über Mr. Driller oder Anna und bringe dich grabenderweise in Sicherheit. Weiche herabfallenden Blöcken aus und erreiche die Luftkapseln, um deinen Sauerstoffvorrat aufzufüllen. Stelle deine Bohrfertigkeiten in drei Spielmodi unter Beweis: Mission Driller, Endless Driller und Time Attack Driller.

AU.name: Mr. Driller™2
AU.description: The world is once again threatened to be buried by a mysterious outbreak of coloured blocks. Only the heroic Mr. Driller can save the day! Or can he? Enter Anna Hottenmayer, a rival driller! As the original Mr. Driller or Anna, you must dig to safety, avoid falling blocks and scramble to reach air capsules to replenish your oxygen. Test your drill skills in three game modes: Mission Driller, Endless Driller and Time Attack Driller.

BG.name: Mr. Driller™2
BG.description: The world is once again threatened to be buried by a mysterious outbreak of coloured blocks. Only the heroic Mr. Driller can save the day! Or can he? Enter Anna Hottenmayer, a rival driller! As the original Mr. Driller or Anna, you must dig to safety, avoid falling blocks and scramble to reach air capsules to replenish your oxygen. Test your drill skills in three game modes: Mission Driller, Endless Driller and Time Attack Driller.

BE.name: Mr. Driller™2
BE.description: Le monde est de nouveau menacé d'être enterré sous une montagne de blocs multicolores ! Seul Mr. Driller, héros de la perceuse, peut encore le sauver. Mais y arrivera-t-il ? C'est là qu'entre en scène Anna Hottenmayer, sa célèbre rivale ! Incarnez Mr. Driller ou Anna. Percez, creusez et mettez-vous à l'abri des blocs qui tombent. Il vous faudra atteindre les capsules d'oxygène au plus vite avant de manquer d'air ! Mettez vos compétences de perceur à l'épreuve dans trois modes de jeu : Mission Driller, Endless Driller et Time Attack Driller.

ES.name: Mr. Driller™2
ES.description: Una montaña de misteriosos bloques de colores amenaza con sepultar el planeta. Solo el heroico Mr. Driller puede salvarlo... ¿o quizá no? ¡Que entre en escena Anna Hottenmayer, una minera rival! Métete en la piel de Mr. Driller o de Anna, y perfora, esquiva los bloques que vayan cayendo y consigue cápsulas de oxígeno para mantenerte con vida. Pon a prueba tus habilidades de excavación en los tres modos disponibles: Mission Driller, Endless Driller y Time Attack Driller.

IT.name: Mr. Driller™2
IT.description: Il mondo rischia di nuovo di essere seppellito da una misteriosa ondata di blocchi colorati. Solo l'eroico Mr. Driller può risolvere la situazione! O forse no? C'è anche Anna Hottenmayer, una rivale esperta in perforazioni! Nei panni di Mr. Driller o Anna, scava per metterti in salvo, evita i blocchi in caduta e cerca di raggiungere le capsule d'aria per recuperare ossigeno. Metti alla prova le tue abilità in tre modalità di gioco: Mission Driller, Endless Driller e Time Attack Driller.

NO.name: Mr. Driller™2
NO.description: The world is once again threatened to be buried by a mysterious outbreak of coloured blocks. Only the heroic Mr. Driller can save the day! Or can he? Enter Anna Hottenmayer, a rival driller! As the original Mr. Driller or Anna, you must dig to safety, avoid falling blocks and scramble to reach air capsules to replenish your oxygen. NL.name: Mr. Driller™2
NL.description: Een mysterieuze uitbraak van gekleurde blokken dreigt wederom de wereld te bedelven. Enkel de heldhaftige Mr. Driller kan de boel redden! Of is dat wel zo? Er is een rivaliserende "driller", namelijk Anna Hottenmayer! Of je nu speelt als Mr. Driller of Anna, het doel blijft gelijk: boor je een weg naar veiligheid, ontwijk vallende blokken en houd via capsules je zuurstofvoorraad op peil. Je boorvaardigheden worden in drie spelstanden op de proef gesteld: Mission Driller, Endless Driller en Time Attack Driller.

NZ.name: Mr. Driller™2
NZ.description: The world is once again threatened to be buried by a mysterious outbreak of coloured blocks. Only the heroic Mr. Driller can save the day! Or can he? Enter Anna Hottenmayer, a rival driller! As the original Mr. Driller or Anna, you must dig to safety, avoid falling blocks and scramble to reach air capsules to replenish your oxygen. Test your drill skills in three game modes: Mission Driller, Endless Driller and Time Attack Driller.

PL.name: Mr. Driller™2
PL.description: The world is once again threatened to be buried by a mysterious outbreak of coloured blocks. Only the heroic Mr. Driller can save the day! Or can he? Enter Anna Hottenmayer, a rival driller! As the original Mr. Driller or Anna, you must dig to safety, avoid falling blocks and scramble to reach air capsules to replenish your oxygen. Test your drill skills in three game modes: Mission Driller, Endless Driller and Time Attack Driller.

PT.name: Mr. Driller™2
PT.description: Uma vez mais o mundo está sob a ameaça de ser soterrado por um ataque misterioso de blocos coloridos. Apenas o heroico Mr. Driller o pode salvar! Ou será que não? Apresentamos-te Anna Hottenmayer, uma perfuradora rival! No papel do original Mr. Driller ou de Anna, tens de perfurar para te manteres em segurança, evitar os blocos que vão caindo e lutar para apanhares cápsulas de ar e conseguires repor as tuas reservas de oxigénio. Testa as tuas capacidades de perfuração em três modos de jogo: Mission Driller, Endless Driller e Time Attack Driller.

RU.name: Mr. Driller™2
RU.description: Нет большей угрозы для мира, чем нашествие разноцветных кубиков! И одолеть эту напасть может только Mr. Driller... Или не только? Встречайте: в игру вступает Anna Hottenmayer, неутомимая соперница главного героя! В роли Mr. Driller или Anna вам предстоит уворачиваться от падающих блоков и бурить тоннели в толще земли, чтобы пробиться к капсулам с живительным кислородом и пройти очередной уровень. Испытайте свои навыки в трех режимах — Mission Driller, Endless Driller и Time Attack Driller.
